feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Need to Display Uploaded Image from Custom Table in ABAP Report Output
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have two requirements related to handling images in SAP ABAP :

  1. In a custom screen, users should be able to upload an image, and that image needs to be saved in a custom table. I plan to achieve this by converting the image into an XSTRING (raw string) and storing it in the custom table.

  2. In a custom report, I need to fetch the records from this custom table and convert the XSTRING data back into a viewable image file. In the report output, there should be a file icon field, and when the user clicks on it, the corresponding image should open or display.

My question is:
Is it possible to convert the stored XSTRING value back into an image file and open it directly from the report? If yes, could you please explain how to achieve this or share any sample code?

Thanks in advance,
Kiran

entry.title: Table line items not displaying in duplicated form copy (Adobe Form)
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m working on an Adobe Form where my client requires a duplicate copy of the form within the same PDF.

I have duplicated the entire form object, and both the original and duplicate forms are bound to the same XML data source.

Here’s the issue:

  • The field values (scripted fields) are displaying correctly in PDF preview.

  • However, the table line items are displayed only in the original form and not in the duplicate form copy.

  • The duplicate form is bound to the same XML nodes, but the table data is not replicating dynamically. even though I have tried using scripting logic to force data refresh and rebind events.

Has anyone else faced this kind of issue before?
Would appreciate any suggestions or solutions to make the table data appear dynamically in both copies during preview or print.

Thanks in advance!
— Merushetha Kannan
SAP Forms service by Adobe SAP Interactive Forms by Adobe SAP BTP ABAP environment @XFA @adobe @SAPExpert JavaScript SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment

entry.title: Mismatch in Table Display – Incorrect Values for Packing and Forwarding in Adobe Form
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

The XML data provided by the functional consultant has been verified and is mapped correctly as per the SAP data in the Adobe LiveCycle designer. As per the XML:

  • Packing (ZK10) value = 125
  • Forwarding (ZK03) value = 23,000

However, when the Purchase Order (MM-PO) form is previewed in Adobe LiveCycle Designer, the table displays incorrect values:

  • Packing (ZK10) is showing as 240
  • Forwarding (ZK03) is showing as 47,50,22,365

The XML mapping and data structure appear to be correct, but the data displayed in the table(form- design Adobe LiveCycle designer) is not aligning properly with the source values. This indicates that the issue is likely related to data binding or layout rendering within the LiveCycle form.

The exact root cause is not yet identified. Could you please check and advise on the possible solution for this mismatch issue?

I have attached the screenshots for your reference

 FORM TABLE-ADOBE LIVECYCLE DESIGNER

XML DATA SOURCE:

Thanks for your support in Advance!
SAP Interactive Forms by Adobe SAP Forms service by Adobe JavaScript @Pa_Vi @SAPABAP

entry.title: ZLOCAL is not a valid software component for package Zxx_TUTORIALS in Eclipse ADT 2022-09
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am using Eclipse 2022-09 with ABAP Development Tools (ADT), and I am having trouble creating a new Z-package.

Issue 1: ZLOCAL is not accepted (TR458)

When I select the software component ZLOCAL, I get:


ZLOCAL is not a valid software component for package ZXX_TUTORIALS (TR458)

It also required choosing a transport layer, which I believe should not happen for a LOCAL component.

Issue 2: HOME also asks for a Transport Layer

If I select HOME, the system again requests a transport layer.
After choosing a layer, I get this error:

 
System setting does not allow you to change R3TR DEVC Zxx_TUTORIALS
Message No. TR006

Diagnosis says:

  • HOME is not modifiable in this SAP system

  • Modifiability must be changed in Transport Organiser Tools → System Change Options

  • System Details

    • Eclipse 2022-09

    • Latest ADT

    • SAP backend: S/4HANA (on-premise)

      Any help or direction will be appreciated.
      Thank you!

entry.title: Adding where condition in CDS extension
entry.content:
Hi All,
I want to add one where condition in the standard CDS view. Is possible to add where condition in CDS extension. Does anyone achieve this?

Or is that any other way possible?
Thanks in advance

entry.title: Can we use a Custom Entity in the Custom CDS View app in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Can we use a Custom Entity in the Custom CDS View app in Public Cloud, and can it be combined with an existing Analytics Cube?
I have a custom entity for field now i want to bring that field in the My existing analytic query whether its possible.?
SAP Analytics Cloud, hybrid analytics  SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Extensibility SAP BTP ABAP environment

entry.title: How to Calculate VAT for PO and get in the Standard form(MM_PUR_PURCHASE_ORDER)
entry.content: Hello experts, I’m using the PO form template MM_PUR_PURCHASE_ORDER. I need to calculate VAT at line item level, sum it up, and show the final amount including VAT in the PO PDF. I understand VAT fields exist in PO item conditions, but they are not exposed in the delivered template. Could you guide me on how to expose these fields via CDS/OData and bind them in the form template, including the calculation logic for summation? Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Custom Number Range for Process Order
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts
We have a requirement to set up custom number ranges for Process Orders based on their order types.

For example

  • Order Type PO1 should start from 500000

  • Order Type PO2 should start from 900000

How can this be configured in SAP S4HANA Public Cloud
Kindly assist

entry.title: In public cloud how to get Sales Order Header Text
entry.content:
How can we read Sales Order Header Text in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (clean core, no modification)?

I have tried multiple ways but couldn’t get the header text of a Sales Order.
In Public Cloud:

  • Read_Text is not allowed

  • Table access to STXH/STXL is not allowed

  • CDS view extensibility for reading text via text-object/text-id is not available

  • BAdI access to SD text API is restricted

  • The only relevant released view is I_SALESORDERTP , but this cannot be used inside our custom CDS view.

entry.title: RAP navigation to object page of another app as a link on header area of Object page
entry.content:
Dear All, 

I'm looking for CDS annotation or solution to navigate another std. App which should look like a link at header area of object page as shown in below image. ￼Once I click the link it should navigate to std. app's Object page instead of the list report.

Current system: S4 2023 

Thank you !

entry.title: CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR while sending GET Request to ODATA v4 with /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I am trying to create ODATA V4 as mentioned in SAP Note 2485370, So I created a custom entity in Eclipse and also a Class with below method implemented from interface /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC. 

@EndUserText.label: 'ZSAMPLE_SERVICE'
@ObjectModel.query.implementedBy: 'ABAP:ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'
define custom entity ZSAMPLE_SERVICE
{
   key component_material : abap.char(40);
       fg_material  : abap.char(40);
       fg_material_descr : abap.char(40);
  
}

And Class as below

CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE DEFINITION
  PUBLIC
  inheriting from /iwbep/cx_gateway
  FINAL
  CREATE PUBLIC .

  PUBLIC SECTION.

    INTERFACES /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC.
  PROTECTED SECTION.
  PRIVATE SECTION.
ENDCLASS.



CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_REFERENCE.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~DELETE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_ACTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_FUNCTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY.

    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.


    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TS_DATA ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY_LIST.
    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service,
          TT_DATA TYPE TABLE OF zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.
    APPEND TS_DATA TO TT_DATA.
    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TT_DATA[] ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA_LIST.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~UPDATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

After this, I created service definition to explose above cds entity and then service binding.

When I do Get request to my service URL from postman I am  getting dump saying as below

Error analysis                                                                                    |
|    The application has indicated exception "CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR" as the                |
|     reason for the                                                                               |
|    termination:                                                                                  |
|    Processing was aborted because of an application modeling error: See previous                 |
|    in exception chain.                                                                           |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "LCX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_BAD_IMPLMNT" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECM00J". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error occurred during execution of query provider 'ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'                        |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "CX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_CONSTRUCTION" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error during construction of the Unmanaged Query Provider for entity                          |
|    ZSAMPLE_SERVICE                                                                               |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception "CX_SY_CREATE_OBJECT_ERROR"                |
|     that occurred in                                                                             |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 3 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Could not create object; reference variable does not match specified class                    |
|    ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE.

Can anyone help on this?

I appreciate your time and reply on this query.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: Unable to Use ZCDS or Any Standard CDS View in AMDP Table Function
entry.content:
Dear All,

I am working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud  and trying to consume a CDS View in an AMDP Table Function.

However, I am getting the following error during activation: Please see the below Screenshots.

The object DDLS I_PRODUCTIONORDEROPCOMPONENTTP must not be used here, because it is not released for usage in AMDP methods.

Questions:

  1. How can we use a CDS View in an AMDP Table Function in Public Cloud?

  2. How can we release objects from C1 to C4?

  3. Is there any workaround, as this is urgent?

I confirmed I_JOURNALENTRYTP is released for developer extensibility on Business Acceleraor hub.

However, when I tried it to create class on Eclipse, I got the following message.


I also wonder why I_JournalEntryTP is not displayed on Released Objects tab on Eclipse.


I would appreciate it so much if you would suggest some possible cause of this.

Thanks & Regards.

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud – Is it possible to add a 4th Receiver Role in Billing Document Output
entry.content:
Hello SAP Experts,

We are working on Billing Document Output Management in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud using BRF+ (Manage Output Determination Apps).

In Receiver determination (DT_RECEIVER), the system allows only the following standard roles for Billing Document:

  • RE (Bill-to Party)

  • AG (Sold-to Party)

  • RG (Payer)

Our business requirement is to print 4 copies of the Billing Invoice (Original, Duplicate, Triplicate, and Extra Copy).

We checked if an additional receiver role (for example, a 4th role or custom role) can be added in Output Management, but Public Cloud does not seem to support custom partner roles.

Question:

  • Is it technically possible in S/4HANA Public Cloud to add a 4th receiver role for Billing Document output determination?

  • If not, is the only supported approach to handle multiple invoice copies inside a single Adobe Form?

Any official confirmation or SAP note reference would be very helpful.

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Unable to find "Maintain Communication Users" or "SAP_BR_ADMINISTRATOR" in Cloud Shared Trial
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I am currently working through a development scenario in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Shared Trial (US10). I have created a custom Communication Scenario in Eclipse (ADT) and I am now trying to set up the inbound communication.

According to the documentation, I need to use the Maintain Communication Users app to create a technical user (ZXE3_FITFOR). However, I am facing the following issues:

  • App Missing: The "Maintain Communication Users" app does not appear in my Fiori Launchpad or in the App Finder.

  • Role Missing: I cannot find the SAP_BR_ADMINISTRATOR role template to assign the necessary permissions to my user.

  • Restricted Access: I attempted to check the Technical Monitoring Cockpit, but it only provides read-only metrics and no user creation capabilities.

I understand that the Shared Trial is a restricted environment. Is it possible to activate the SAP_CORE_BC_COM (Communication Management) catalog in this specific trial, or is this administrative functionality completely disabled for shared users?

If this is a limitation of the Shared Trial, would moving to a BTP ABAP Environment Trial be the correct path to gain the administrator rights needed for Communication Management?

Any guidance would be greatly appreciated!

Kindly suggest me the options to extend.

Thanks and Regards,

Praveen

entry.title: XCO_CP_XLSX Currency/Quantity Formatting
entry.content:
Is it possible to apply Currency/Quantity/Domain(Conversion Exit) formatting, while writing to an Excel file using XCO_CP_XLSX?

PS: Not looking for this answer: Convert all fields to Strings.

Whoever has SAP S-User-ID, please vote here to have this feature included in XCO_CP_XLSX:

https://influence.sap.com/sap/ino/#/idea/364375

entry.title: How to create Business Configuration Maintenance Object / Cusomizing with header and child?
entry.content:
Hello, 

i want to create a Business configuration Maintenance Object via the adt generation wizard. Therefore i defined an header (*_status_clas & Child (*_status_code) table. 

After generation i only get the header and not the relationship to the child defined in the table.  I would expect that the generator is able to get the relationship (header-child) from the foreign key and creates the front end accordingly. 

When i tried the same for text tables it worked without any problems.

entry.title: Operations not getting created from BAPI_ROUTING_CREATE even though routing is getting generated
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am calling BAPI to create routing as shown below and passing the following data. The routing is getting created without any errors, but operations are not getting created. Can someone please suggest how this can be fixed. The same data when passed from SE37, operations are getting created.

P.S: I have already tried leading 0's in sequence, group counter, activity.

CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_ROUTING_CREATE'
      EXPORTING
        testrun                = lv_testrun
*        profile                = 'PI01'
        bomusage               = '1'
        application            = 'PP01'
      IMPORTING
        group                  = lv_group
        groupcounter           = lv_groupcounter
      TABLES
        task                   = lt_tsk
        materialtaskallocation = lt_mtk
        sequence               = lt_seq
        operation              = lt_opr
        suboperation           = lt_sbo
        referenceoperation     = lt_rfo
        workcenterreference    = lt_wcr
        componentallocation    = lt_com
        productionresource     = lt_prt
        inspcharacteristic     = lt_cha
        textallocation         = lt_txt
*       text                   = text[]
        return                 = lt_return[]
      EXCEPTIONS
        error_message          = 1
        OTHERS                 = 2.


    LOOP AT lt_return WHERE type CA 'EAX'. ENDLOOP.

    IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
      CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_ROLLBACK'.
    ELSE.
      CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT' EXPORTING wait = 'X'.
    ENDIF.

MATERIALPLANTTASK_LIST_GROUPGROUP_COUNTERCHANGE_NOVALID_FROMCHANGE_NO_TOVALID_TO_DATEDEL_INDDOC_NUMBERITM_NUMBERWORK_BREAKDOWN_STRUCT_ELEMENTMATERIAL_EXTERNALMATERIAL_GUIDMATERIAL_VERSION
SFG05PE01500000611 20260113 99991231  0 SFG05

entry.title: How to use Custom Logic App to pass Contract Header data to Sales Order header?
entry.content:
I'm fairly new on with CleanCore approach. 

For passing the data of Contract Header into Call off Sales Order header, which extension point will be used? is SD_SLS_MODIFY_HEAD correct? I am trying to pass the values of some standard and custom fields.
